1.title: Marketing Management
1.subtitle: A unified CRM to consolidate fragmented data across 4 departments

sections.heading: Project Overview
sections.content:
With 14k customers this desktop app was key to integrate the spread-out data from all campaigns and leads, while providing useful manipulation of them and displaying it on multiple dashboards.

This project became the proof-of-concept for the company's first design system, now adopted company-wide.

sections.heading: The Challenge
sections.content: Marketing data was scattered across 4 different departments with no centralized system. Customer complaints via Facebook were handled manually, leading to slow resolution times.

sections.heading: The Solution
sections.content: Created a unified CRM platform that integrated all marketing touchpoints, automated Facebook complaint tracking, and established the foundation for a scalable design system.

2.title: MkM - Design System
2.subtitle: Pioneering design systems in engineering-first environments

sections.heading: Project Overview
sections.content: Building the company's first comprehensive design system from the ground up. This system needed to serve both designers and front-end developers while maintaining flexibility for rapid product iteration.

sections.heading: The Challenge
sections.content: Engineers were building UI components without design guidance, leading to inconsistent user experiences. No documentation existed for reusable components.

sections.heading: The Solution
sections.content: Developed a comprehensive design system with component libraries, detailed documentation, and code snippets that empowered front-end teams to work independently while maintaining design consistency.

3.title: Tomato Energy Microsite
3.subtitle: Helping customers understand their energy journey

sections.heading: Project Overview
sections.content: A customer-facing microsite designed to simplify the complex energy switching process and help users understand their energy consumption patterns.

sections.heading: The Challenge
sections.content: Energy customers found the switching process confusing and were unclear about their consumption patterns and potential savings.

sections.heading: The Solution
sections.content: Created an intuitive microsite with clear visualizations, step-by-step guidance, and personalized energy insights that demystified the switching process.
